text: Isela Vega Durazo (5 November 1939 – 9 March 2021) was a Mexican actress, singer-songwriter, and filmmaker. She was born in Hermosillo, Sonora. She was best known for her role as Elita in Sam Peckinpah's Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia. She also starred as Victoria Aguirre in the Netflix original series The House of Flowers. Vega died of cancer in Mexico City on 9 March 2021 at the age of 81.Murió Isela Vega, actriz mexicana de cine y televisión ==References== ==Other websites== * *Interview in La Jornada Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican movie directors
title: Isela Vega
